results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, a(2n) = 2 * a(n), a(2n-1) = 1 + (2 * a(A064989(2n-1)-1)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of related permutations:
Other identities. For all n >= 1 the following holds:
A000035(a(n)) = A000035(n). [Like A005940 & A005941, this also preserves the parity].
xref: Similar or related permutations: A005940, A005941, A064216, A243071, A245605, A246377, A246380.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 27 2014
